titles.title: Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for an increase in the limit on the length of an agreement under the Medicare independence at home medical practice demonstration program.
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Senate Committee on Finance discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 114-172, Part I.
Committee on Energy and Commerce discharged.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 127.

action.text: Mr. Ryan (WI) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 971.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it passed the Senate on April 22, 2015. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Improvement Act of 2015
(Sec. 2) Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to increase from a three-year to a five-year period the length of an agreement with an independence at home medical practice under the Medicare Independence at Home Medical Practice Demonstration Program.
